 import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AppComponent } from 'src/app/app.component'; @Component({ selector: "app-directorio", templateUrl: "./directorio.page.html", styleUrls: ["./directorio.page.scss"], }) export class DirectorioPage implements OnInit { constructor( private comp : AppComponent) {} ngOnInit() { this.comp.menu(); } }
